title: 02/15/2021 - Hour 2 - Colin Right Colin Wrong, Trent Dilfer, Ric Bucher
itunes:title: 02/15/2021 - Hour 2 - Colin Right Colin Wrong, Trent Dilfer, Ric Bucher
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, we start with Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Also, Super Bowl champion and NFL analyst Trent Dilfer drops by The Herd to discuss the NFL's current events. Finally, radio host and NBA analyst Ric Bucher catches up on NBA storylines with Colin. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
